Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I kindly propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available to any other potential buyers. Don't miss this opportunity to own a piece that's worth every penny. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
